nodes.text: Vertseth Automata was a droid manufacturing company based on Vertseth. They were the manufacturers of the techno-service droid, including the unit Todo 360, who worked for bounty hunter Cad Bane during the Clone Wars.

Vertseth Automata were first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends reference book Star Wars: The Clone Wars Character Encyclopedia, which was written by Jason Fry and released in 2010. The company was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
